value.title: Tom Cotton calls on China to produce evidence that disputes Wuhan lab as source of COVID-19
value.excerpt: All evidence in investigations of the origin of the deadly coronavirus pandemic points to two laboratories in Wuhan, China, Sen. Tom Cotton, R-Ark., stated Tuesday.

value.title: Trump Urges China to Reveal All About Origin of Coronavirus
value.excerpt: President Donald Trump on Tuesday said the United States would release its report detailing the origins of the novel coronavirus over time, but gave not other details or timeline. "We will be reporting very definitively over a period of time,

value.title: No increase in Covid-19 cases in Hubei, China
value.excerpt: BEIJING: China’s Hubei province, hit-hardest by Covid-19 pandemic, has reported no newly confirmed case of the novel coronavirus for 31 consecutive days since April 4. As of Monday, there were no existing confirmed Covid19 case in the province,

images.title: No increase in Covid-19 cases in Hubei, China

value.title: Sen. Tom Cotton on US-China tension over handling of coronavirus
value.excerpt: Sen. Tom Cotton (R—Ark.) to discuss the latest on the tensions between the U.S. and China as well as Big Pharma's efforts to create a Covid-19 vaccine.

images.title: Sen. Tom Cotton on US-China tension over handling of coronavirus

value.title: Tucker Carlson: For China, the coronavirus pandemic has been a blessing as it plans to rule the world
value.excerpt: For the West, the coronavirus has been a bewildering disaster; Chinese government thinks it's the beginning of a new Chinese century.

images.title: Tucker Carlson: For China, the coronavirus pandemic has been a blessing as it plans to rule the world

value.title: COVID-19 Patients Carried Coronavirus Antibodies for at Least Two Weeks after Recovering in Small Study in China
value.excerpt: The study could help answer questions about how long a person recovering from coronavirus has antibodies to fight off repeat infections. At the moment, it is not known how long antibodies last or whether a person can get reinfected.

images.title: COVID-19 Patients Carried Coronavirus Antibodies for at Least Two Weeks after Recovering in Small Study in China

value.title: There's No Good Way to Make China 'Pay' for the Pandemic | Opinion
value.excerpt: Any policy of holding Beijing accountable should go beyond political theater, be realistically achievable and not—to borrow a recent favorite phrase of President Donald Trump's—make the cure worse than the problem.

value.title: Europe and China were on course for a reset. Coronavirus changed all that
value.excerpt: Before coronavirus brought the world to its knees, 2020 was slated to be a crucial year for the European Union and China.

images.title: Europe and China were on course for a reset. Coronavirus changed all that

value.title: US national security officials and global health experts are increasingly concerned China will develop a coronavirus vaccine first
value.excerpt: As President Donald Trump adopts an increasingly hard-line stance toward Beijing, the US could be at a disadvantage if China finds a vaccine first.

images.title: US national security officials and global health experts are increasingly concerned China will develop a coronavirus vaccine first

value.title: Column: The White House plays dumb on the pandemic’s China connection
value.excerpt: Anger at Xi Jinping's government over the coronavirus crisis is warranted, but treating a nuclear and economic superpower as an existential enemy to satisfy domestic political needs isn't the smart way to go.

images.title: Column: The White House plays dumb on the pandemic’s China connection

value.title: Hong Kong March Retail Sales Plunge 42% Year-On-Year as Coronavirus Hurts Economy
value.excerpt: Hong Kong's retail sales fell by 42% in March from a year earlier, as travel restrictions kept tourists away and most residents steered clear of shops and restaurants for fear of catching the coronavirus.

images.title: Hong Kong March Retail Sales Plunge 42% Year-On-Year as Coronavirus Hurts Economy

value.title: Hong Kong to relax some restrictions as new coronavirus cases dwindle
value.excerpt: Hong Kong's government said on Tuesday it will relax restrictions on public gatherings and allow gyms, cinemas and beauty parlours to re-open later this week as only a handful of new coronavirus cases have been reported in recent weeks.

images.title: Hong Kong to relax some restrictions as new coronavirus cases dwindle

value.title: China spent years preparing for this economic crash, fearing political pitfalls
value.excerpt: Senior Chinese officials concluded in a lengthy study that economic crises can lead to a reshuffling of the global balance of powers.

images.title: China spent years preparing for this economic crash, fearing political pitfalls

value.title: 4 New Cases in South Korea, China Show Work on Containment
value.excerpt: China and South Korea, which had early, intense outbreaks of the coronavirus, together reported only four new infections Tuesday and were slowly resuming public events after months of containment efforts.

images.title: 4 New Cases in South Korea, China Show Work on Containment

value.title: Taiwan rebuffs WHO, says China has no right to represent it
value.excerpt: Only Taiwan's democratically-elected government can represent its people on the world stage, not China, its foreign ministry said on Tuesday, calling on the World Health Organization (WHO) to "cast off" China's control during the coronavirus pandemic.

images.title: Taiwan rebuffs WHO, says China has no right to represent it

value.title: The Latest: China reports 3 new cases, New Zealand none
value.excerpt: The new coronavirus causes mild or moderate symptoms for most people. For some, especially older adults and people with existing health problems, it can cause more severe illness or death. — China reports 3 new coronavirus cases,

images.title: The Latest: China reports 3 new cases, New Zealand none

value.title: The Latest: China reports 1 new virus case, no deaths
value.excerpt: China has reported one new case of coronavirus and no deaths, marking three weeks since it recorded a COVID-19 fatality

images.title: The Latest: China reports 1 new virus case, no deaths

value.title: What to know about US legislation aimed at punishing China for human rights abuses
value.excerpt: China has thrown an estimated 1 million minority Uyghurs into concentration camps without any legal process, according to the United Nations.

images.title: What to know about US legislation aimed at punishing China for human rights abuses

value.title: China reports one new coronavirus case in mainland
value.excerpt: China reported one new coronavirus case for May 4, down from three the day before, data from the national health authority showed on Tuesday.

value.title: China Quiets Talk of Coronavirus Cover-Up in Wuhan: Live Coverage
value.excerpt: Demands for accountability run afoul of China’s nationalist narrative. A dozen countries, including Italy and India, began to relax lockdowns, and Israel all but declared victory.

images.title: China Quiets Talk of Coronavirus Cover-Up in Wuhan: Live Coverage

value.title: Coronavirus, Italy, China: Your Monday Briefing
value.excerpt: Good morning. We’re covering Italy starting to reopen, China facing a backlash and why some places fare better with outbreaks than others. Italy, which has had the deadliest outbreak in Europe, will enter a reopening phase today,

images.title: Coronavirus, Italy, China: Your Monday Briefing

value.title: Trump steps-up effort to blame China for coronavirus
value.excerpt: The Trump administration is escalating an effort to blame China for the novel coronavirus pandemic as global pressure grows on Beijing to cooperate with an investigation into the origins of the outbreak.

images.title: Trump steps-up effort to blame China for coronavirus

value.title: Congress Republicans accuse China of seeking to indoctrinate U.S. students
value.excerpt: A group of U.S. House of Representatives Republicans released a letter on Monday charging China with seeking to indoctrinate American students, the latest anti-China statement from congressional allies of President Donald Trump.

images.title: Congress Republicans accuse China of seeking to indoctrinate U.S. students

value.title: Peter Navarro: China's lies about coronavirus are bigger issue than trade deal
value.excerpt: White House Office of Trade and Manufacturing Policy director Peter Navarro said on “America’s Newsroom” on Monday that the fact that “China lied” about the coronavirus is a bigger issue than what “may or may not happen with the trade deal.

images.title: Peter Navarro: China's lies about coronavirus are bigger issue than trade deal

value.title: Rep. Abigail Spanberger: ‘We are ceding ground to China’
value.excerpt: Rep. Abigail Spanberger (D-Va.), a former CIA case officer and one of a bevy of national security-savvy freshmen Democrats, took to the House floor last Tuesday as part of a bipartisan group from the House Foreign Affairs Committee speaking on the role of the United States in the world and its failure to exercise global leadership in the novel coronavirus pandemic.

images.title: Rep. Abigail Spanberger: ‘We are ceding ground to China’

value.title: Report: International intelligence dossier alleges China mishandled coronavirus response
value.excerpt: Telegraph reports a dossier from an intelligence alliance between the U.S., U.K., Canada, Australia and New Zealand alleges China misled and shielded information on the coronavirus outbreak. CBS News intelligence and national security reporter Olivia Gazis joined CBSN with the latest.

images.title: Report: International intelligence dossier alleges China mishandled coronavirus response

value.title: Hong Kong Plans Bounce-Back After Two Weeks With No Local Coronavirus Cases
value.excerpt: Hong Kong passed a crucial milestone of two weeks, or one full quarantine period, without recording any new, locally transmitted coronavirus infections, as it charts a course out of its deepest economic slump on record.

images.title: Hong Kong Plans Bounce-Back After Two Weeks With No Local Coronavirus Cases

value.title: GLOBAL MARKETS-Stocks fall as U.S.-China tensions threaten rebound
value.excerpt: European stock markets and oil prices fell on Monday as a spat between top U.S. officials and China over the origin of the coronavirus fuelled fears of a new trade war, derailing a rebound in global markets.

images.title: GLOBAL MARKETS-Stocks fall as U.S.-China tensions threaten rebound

value.title: Coronavirus Survivors Want Answers, and China Is Silencing Them
value.excerpt: In Wuhan, where the pandemic started, the police have threatened and interrogated grieving relatives. Lawyers have been warned not to help them sue.

images.title: Coronavirus Survivors Want Answers, and China Is Silencing Them
